bug.author: fpasch
bug.description: I see some issues with WheelPhysicsControl: 1. Missleading name The WheelPhysicsControl has a member steer_angle. This is somehow misleading, as it's not the current angle but most likely the max angle. To clarify things, we should rename it to max_steer_angle. 2. disable_steering always false I see that for my vehicle the member disable_steering is always false. I would assume, that this member shows which wheel is fixed (disable_steering=True), and which one can turn (disable_steering=False). Also, maybe we can get rid of the negation by using is_steerable.

comments.comment: It would also make sense to be able to identify each wheel. Currently VehiclePhysicsControl only contains an array of wheels.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fpasch>@fpasch</denchmark-link> , Sorry for late reply, just checked again and indeed you are right! I've included the corresponding changes about renaming those 2 parameters in branch <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/pull/1562>#1562</denchmark-link> and made a PR already. Thank you very much for your feedback. Really appreciate it!
